title: Strawberry Shake Sweet
original_name: ストロベリーシェイク SWEET
sinopse: Sixteen-year-old pop culture idol Julia Tachibana takes in the new talent Ran as part of her job, but ends up falling for the other girl almost immediately. Slapstick fun, hijinks and other extremely humorous situations follow as Julia tries her best to woo Ran but remain a professional idol!
